enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the same input parameters (object and comparator) with the only difference being the optional criterion in the target method.
The constructor initializes the same fields (object, comparator, and criterion) as the target method, making it useful for setting up test cases.
The test method evaluates the comparison based on the criterion, which is directly related to the output behavior of the target method.
The target method relies on the Comparator's compare method to perform the comparison, making it a key dependency for assertions.
